physical_examinations.relevant_findings: FT presented with a hemangioma precursor on the right hand and wrist; ST had a mild reducible umbilical hernia. Both twins exhibited camptodactyly.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: At 3 months of chronological age, ST showed a wide glabellar nevus simplex, moderate macroglossia, and the umbilical hernia had grown larger but remained reducible.
